from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
import logging
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

jsonId =49 # 42,43,49
year=2023
month=1
day=16
hour=0
minute=0
second=0

from datetime import datetime
dt = datetime(year=year, month=month, day=day,hour=hour,minute=minute,second=second)

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

config_target_container = "abfss://odw-config@" + spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get') + ".dfs.core.windows.net/"
standardised_target_container = "abfss://odw-standardised@" + spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get') + ".dfs.core.windows.net/"

import json
from pyspark.sql.types import StringType,BooleanType,DateType,TimestampType,IntegerType, FloatType, StructType
outstanding_files_table_json = spark.read.text(config_target_container + "orchestration/scheduling_outstanding_files_table.json", wholetext=True).first().value
outstanding_struct_schema = StructType.fromJson(json.loads(outstanding_files_table_json))
new_outst_file = spark.createDataFrame([[dt, jsonId]], outstanding_struct_schema)
new_outst_file.write.format("delta").mode("append").save(standardised_target_container+"config/raw_to_std_outstanding_files")
